game_description: Southern Italy, 1943. Fascist forces occupy your homeland. Using stealth, authentic weaponry, and your skilled marksmanship as an elite sniper, fight for the Italian Resistance in this exhilarating first-person shooter. HEART-POUNDING GUNPLAY – Grab your rifle, gaze down the scope & take aim with realistic ballistics & immersive weapon interactions EXCLUSIVE CAMPAIGN – Take on an explosive stand-alone campaign with 18 replayable missions & hours of gameplay FREE MOVEMENT – Use stealth & cunning to outmanoeuvre enemy troops across levels packed with tactical possibilities AUTHENTIC WW2 WEAPONS – Experience historically accurate WW2 weaponry, with an armoury of rifles, pistols, shotguns, explosives & more VISCERAL X-RAY KILL-CAM – Witness the brutal effect of your shot as Sniper Elite’s signature kill-cam returns, rebuilt for VR
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: I have always liked the sniper elite series but there are some improvements that need to be made to make the game better mainly mission 3 (help from above) needs to be much easier on lower difficulty’s as you are to defend an objective alone against an entire platoon of German troops and you can’t leave the tower and once they get to the objective they run all over the place making them impossible to hit and you lose the mission another thing is make the guns less janky to use as when I go to grab onto the trigger it grabs the bolt and vice versa. Overall it’s a great game it just needs a few improvements to make it complete.
review_2: I was having a lot of fun with this game running around with a sniper and blowing peoples heads off. Until I realized there where level requirements to unlock each level like it was a stupid phone game. Then I pretty much lost all interest in playing it because I had already sunk hours into the game and I can’t complete the main story without getting it all confused because I have to play every level again for the smallest achievement to get more story out of the game. Unless your into that sort of thing same your money onward has better gunplay than this game by a mile.
review_3: Doing my head in I can't pass this section . I get over run every time. Only 2 bloody Germans left and they over run me. Stopped trying now waste of money for me . The scope keeps turning black so you miss your chance and reloading is a farce. Some serious upgrades need to be sorted before I buy again from this company and I know a lot have complained about the same problems.
review_4: This game is great, the people who complain (specifically about mission 3) are complaining because they suck at aiming… the gunplay is great, reloading isn’t finicky like some people are saying, it’s just a different reloading system in comparison to other vr shooters. Overall, it’s an amazing single player game and I honestly liked following the story
review_5: This isn't a Phone Game. there is no reason whatsoever to lock the levels behind challenges in other levels. Also the bugs really make the game unfun to play. It feels like a half baked game that should've been made correctly but wasn't. It calls itself a Sniper Elite game but doesn't compare to any of the actual games at all. What a disgrace to the series.
